item.title: Building Cool HTML Tools with ChatGPT: My LaTeX MathJax Previewer
item.description: Over the past couple of months, I have been experimenting with building self-contained, small, useful web tools with the help of ChatGPT. All of it lives inside a single HTML file. The result? A live LaTeX MathJax Previewer â€” a simple, responsive site where you can write LaTeX and instantly see how it renders. The idea came from a need I had: sometimes I just want to share how to code some math formula using LaTeX and what it looks like when rendered.
